Description.English: For Modders: Removes ships from the pirate which only should be owned by 1st and 2nd party and the other way round. Also trying to change GUID for supported ships first.
Description.German: Für Modder: Entfernt Schiffe vom Piraten die nur 1st and 2nd party besitzen sollten und andersrum. Versucht vorher Change GUID für unterstützte Schiffe
